keyword: how many calories in tsp of peanut butter
title: How Many Calories in a Teaspoon of Peanut Butter?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in tsp of peanut butter, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and simple tweaks for your diet.
h1: How Many Calories in a Teaspoon of Peanut Butter?
assumptions: Smooth, natural peanut butter; no added sugar or salt; approximately 5 g per teaspoon.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, whether natural or processed, added ingredients, and exact measurement. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One teaspoon of peanut butter contains about 31 kcal and 1.3 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one tsp of peanut butter?
faqs.a: Approximately 31 kcal for natural peanut butter.

faqs.q: Is peanut butter high in fat per tsp?
faqs.a: Yes, about 2.7 g total fat, mostly healthy unsaturated fats.

faqs.q: Does peanut butter have protein in a tsp?
How do calories change with sweetened peanut butter?
faqs.a: Added sugars can increase calories by 10-20 kcal per tsp.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in unsalted peanut butter tsp?
faqs.a: Very low, about 1 mg per tsp in natural varieties.
